mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property_details ( property_id, content, available_date, bath, has_lift, bed, lot, heating, cooling, microwave, burner, fridge, shoe_closet, tv, closet, dining_table, table_item, washer, induction, created_at ) VALUES ( #{propertyId}, #{content}, #{availableDate}, #{bath}, #{hasLift}, #{bed}, #{lot}, #{heating}, #{cooling}, #{microwave}, #{burner}, #{fridge}, #{shoeCloset}, #{tv}, #{closet}, #{diningTable}, #{tableItem}, #{washer}, #{induction}, #{createdAt} )
